thread.title: EastEnders spoilers: Tina Carter prepares to say goodbye to Sylvie
thread.title_full: EastEnders spoilers: Tina Carter prepares to say goodbye to Sylvie

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: EastEnders spoilers: Tina Carter prepares to say goodbye to Sylvie
text:
(Picture: BBC) There are traumatic times ahead for Tina Carter as she prepares for the wrench of saying goodbye to her ailing mum Sylvie. But as the time comes to send Sylvie into a home, will Tina be able to go through with it? 
After caring for Sylvie became too much recently, Tina finally decided to seek professional help, even though it was the last thing that she wanted to do. When social services plan to come and assess Sylvie, it all becomes too much of a reality for Tina and she feels guilty as Sylvie becomes confused over what is going on.
Trying to help, Whitney suggests throwing a 60s themed evening for Sylvie, but will it help her or will she become even more bewildered?
(Picture: BBC) Later, Whitney tries her best to support Tina as she becomes emotional over the thought of saying goodbye to her mum.
Will she be able to cope with leaving Sylvie’s side?
One to watch: Monday 27th March at 8pm on BBC One.
